attributes.action: Change the law so Headteachers and Teachers are not a law unto themselves as they are at present, Headteachers and Teachers at present are only answerable to the schools Board of Governors.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence:

http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/Headsconduct/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
